text: The T-box transcription factors <extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Eomes <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> have been linked to the regulation of genes encoding effector cytokines ( e.g . , <extra_id_0> Ifng <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) and genes important for cytolytic function ( e.g . , <extra_id_0> Prf1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> GzmB <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) ( 20 ) .

text: We investigated the kinetics of expression of these transcription factors in our in vitro cultures ( Fig . 1 , A-D ) .

<extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA and protein were not detectable in naive <extra_id_0> CD8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells , but were strongly induced upon TCR priming ( day 2 ) and remained expressed through day 6 of differentiation ( Fig . 1 , A and C ; quantified in Fig . 1 , B and D ) .

text: In contrast , <extra_id_0> Eomes <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression was low or undetectable at both the mRNA and protein levels in naive <extra_id_0> CD8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells , and TCR priming in culture had only a modest effect on its expression at day 2 ( Fig . 1 , A and C ) .

text: Strong induction of <extra_id_0> Eomes <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA and protein was only observed at day 4 and later ( Fig . 1 , A and C ) .

<extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA expression slightly preceded the expression of <extra_id_0> GzmB <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA ; similarly , <extra_id_0> Eomes <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA and protein were expressed ~1 d ahead of the reexpression of <extra_id_0> perforin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA and protein , respectively ( Fig . 1 , B and D ) .

text: This detailed kinetic analysis suggested that , under our culture conditions , <extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Eomes <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> contribute to distinct aspects of gene transcription during CTL differentiation .

<extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is required early for <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> production , and our data suggested that <extra_id_0> Eomes <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> might not function during this early period but rather might contribute later to the control of <extra_id_0> perforin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression .

text: Our data seemed most consistent with a model in which TCR signals induce <extra_id_0> T-bet <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , which in turn induces <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 17 ) and possibly <extra_id_0> granzyme B <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ; subsequently , <extra_id_0> Eomes <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is induced during the period of clonal expansion in <extra_id_0> IL-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and activates <extra_id_0> perforin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression .
